LoginForm.tooltip: Enable this option to save your company and user ID for future logins. Your password will not be stored.

StatusPage.title: The login page could not be found
StatusPage.subtitle: The login page you requested is no longer available or the link is invalid. Please check the URL.

ErrorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
ErrorBoundary.information: Our team has been notified and is working to fix this issue.

PasswordReset.title: Forgot credentials?
PasswordReset.description: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your credentials.

TwoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
TwoFactor.selectionDescription: This browser is not yet authorized for use with HR WORKS. Please select a 2FA method.
TwoFactor.emailDescription: An email has been sent to {email}. Please check your inbox and enter the verification code contained in the email in the input field below or click on the link in the email to unlock your browser.
TwoFactor.authenticatorDescription: Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
TwoFactor.yubiKeyDescription: Insert your YubiKey and wait until it glows green. Then touch the sensor with your finger for one second. Enter the verification code afterwards.
TwoFactor.codeInvalid: Invalid or expired code. Please try again.
TwoFactor.codeAlreadyActive: A verification code is already active. Please check your email or wait before requesting a new code.
TwoFactor.sendError: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
